named-query.name: instanceSessionMember.getAll
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM InstanceSessionMember i WHERE i.active = true

named-query.name: instanceSessionMember.getByInstanceSessionAndSessionId
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM InstanceSessionMember i WHERE i.instanceSession = :instanceSession AND i.sessionId = :sessionId AND i.active = true

named-query.name: instanceSessionMember.getAllForInstanceSession
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM InstanceSessionMember i WHERE i.instanceSession = :instanceSession AND i.active = true

named-query.name: instanceSessionMember.getAllForInstance
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM InstanceSessionMember i LEFT JOIN i.instanceSession instanceSession WHERE instanceSession.instance = :instance AND i.active = true

named-query.name: instanceSessionMember.getAllHistoryForInstance
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM InstanceSessionMember i LEFT JOIN i.instanceSession instanceSession WHERE instanceSession.instance = :instance ORDER BY i.id DESC

named-query.name: instanceSessionMember.getBySessionId
named-query.query: SELECT i FROM InstanceSessionMember i WHERE i.sessionId = :sessionId AND i.active = true
